examples.example: 每当我看到那本书，就会想起那段美好的时光。

translate.english: Whenever I see that book, I will think of that wonderful time.

examples.example: 每当我听到那首歌，就会想起和朋友们一起欢乐的日子。

translate.english: Whenever I hear that song, I will think of the happy days with my friends.

examples.example: 每当我看到这张照片，就会想起和家人一起度过的温馨时光。

translate.english: Whenever I see this photo, I will think of the warm time spent with my family.
